hero.title: Transform Your Selfies Into
hero.description: Create thousands of professional, AI-generated photos perfect for social media, profile pictures, or creative projects with our advanced AI photo generator!

features.title: Features
features.description: Discover what makes our AI photo generation special

easySelfieUpload.title: Easy Selfie Upload
easySelfieUpload.description: Upload 10-20 selfies easily from your phone or social media to start generating your AI photos. Vary your angles and expressions for the best AI-generated results.

advancedAI.title: Advanced AI Technology
advancedAI.description: Our AI photo generator is powered by Flux.1, ensuring exceptional realism and creative detail in every AI-generated photo.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Control your AI photo data with public/private gallery options and permanent deletion whenever you choose.

affordablePricing.title: Affordable Pricing
affordablePricing.description: Enjoy clear, one-time AI training costs and just $0.03 per AI-generated photo. No hidden fees or subscriptions with our AI photo app.

thousandsOfStyles.title: Thousands of Styles
thousandsOfStyles.description: Generate thousands of unique AI photos with our "Surprise Me!" feature and custom photo prompts in our AI photo generator.

easyCustomization.title: Easy Customization
easyCustomization.description: Enhance your prompts for personalized AI-generated photos and create similar masterpieces from public photos in our gallery.

gallery.title: Public Gallery
gallery.description: Fresh from our users: the latest AI-generated photos.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: No hidden fees, no subscriptions. Pay only for the AI photos you create.
pricing.perfectFor: Perfect for anyone who wants to create stunning AI-generated photos without commitments.

download.title: Get Started Today
download.description: Download our AI photo app and start creating stunning AI-generated photos in minutes

webApp.title: Web App
webApp.description: Use directly in your browser, no installation required

mobileApps.title: Mobile Apps
mobileApps.description: Download our native AI photo apps for the best AI photo generation experience

footer.title: My AI Photo Shoot
footer.description: Transform your selfies into stunning AI-generated photos with our cutting-edge technology.

supportPage.title: Support
supportPage.description: Need help with our My AI Photo Shoot? Contact us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
